commentsList.text: Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old.

commentsList.name: admin
commentsList.text: json-server is fake REST API to test applications. It is very easy to install and use it with few steps.

commentsList.name: admin
commentsList.text: Create a db.json file in a directory. In our demo we will perform operations on articles with three fields that are id, title and category.
